abstract: Companies such as Eco-Concierge will shop and schedule appointments for green-minded consumers who do not have time to research which products and services are most earth-friendly.
snippet: More personal environmental concierges have sprung up in recent years to help time-starved consumers find eco-friendly services.
lead_paragraph: More personal environmental concierges have sprung up in recent years to help time-starved consumers find eco-friendly services.

headline.main: Personal Eco-Concierges Ease Transition to Green
headline.print_headline: Personal Eco-Concierges Ease Transition to Green
headline.seo: Personal Eco-Concierges Ease Challenges of Going Green
